content.html: Michelle Yeoh was awarded an honorary Doctorate of Fine Arts by the American Film Institute. “You have made my mother the happiest mother in the world today. Now she actually thinks I’m an adult with a real job. She can go around telling everyone, ‘My daughter is a doctor.'”
content.value:
Michelle Yeoh was awarded an honorary Doctorate of Fine Arts by the American Film Institute.

“You have made my mother the happiest mother in the world today. Now she actually thinks I’m an adult with a real job. She can go around telling everyone, ‘My daughter is a doctor.'”
